string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: You can now Get an Special made Dark FirePower Theme made by ALexCerv
Re-DID all the mods from the ground UP
Added multiple Observers accros the System
Added a Global Content Resolver accros the SystemUI
Removed Blank Space in Always Once pop-up window for opening Apps
Fixed Left Signal Position on Statusbar
FirePower Settings APP New Theme and Icon by @myellow Added
Color Main Dailer and choose a Custom Background (thanks to @therassaad)
Choose a custom BG for IncallUI Call Screen
You can now Adust the TextView of the text in settings for Favorites and the List View
You can now Color everything in Notification Drawer
Weather on Lockscreen is now a default but you have to activate weather for it
You can Now Color The Weather on Lockscreen
Rebased to APGS - AUGUST Security Patch
Made an Switch for OutDoor Mode
And Many More Check in Settings>AboutDevice>Changelog For Full Changelog
